instance-variables.toolTipDescription: Legends says the mage has a very strong right arm.
Penetrates through enemies, dealing less damage each time.
Stops an enemy for a short time.
Erects a temporary wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
Lob a volatile ball of fire that explodes once it hits the ground.

properties.text: I am a mage, prodigy in the field of magic, I was trained by many experts and high-class magicians.
